page.title: 06Shilton School Buildings
page.content: The school has been on the same site since {1847}.There are two buildings, the{main school building}and the{old {Headmaster's Schoolhouse},built in {1904, }which is now an office-staffroom and children's toilets.The main school building has 3 classrooms,1 cloakroom and a kitchen built{24 years}ago, where the school meals are cooked.30 children stay,4 bring sandwiches,2 go home.Behind the main school building is a small, outdoor swimming pool which the children use in the summer. The items they have in the school are,{1 T.V., 0 {Computers,0 Videos, 2 Tape recorders,0 {Film Projectors,1 Slide Projector,3 {Radios,2 Duplicators}and{3 {,Typewriters.}The biggest problem is the outdoor toilets ,especially in wet weather. {
